Docs.summary: These classes provide access to a tag technology's features, which vary by the type of tag that is scanned.

remarks.para: These classes provide access to a tag technology's features, which vary by the type of tag that is scanned. A scanned tag can support multiple technologies, and you can find out what they are by calling .
For more information on dealing with tag technologies and handling the ones that you care about, see The Tag Dispatch System. The interface provides an overview of the supported technologies.
